entry.message: [xmlSchema:valueError] Element attribute substitutionGroup value error: xbrldt:hypercubeItem, Namespace is not defined by an import or include element - aau-20241231.xsd 713

[DQC.IFRS.0159.10081] The concept IncomeStatementAbstract does not appear in the financial statements of the filer. This element needs to be included as a component of the financial statements. Please add the element IncomeStatementAbstract to the presentation of the filing.
